articles.author: Alice French
articles.title: Asia’s Intel Suppliers Soar on Hopes of Nvidia Investment Boost - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian suppliers to Intel Corp. saw their shares climb Friday after the US tech firm’s stock jumped 23% following news of a $5 billion investment by chipmaker Nvidia Corp.
articles.content:
